testimonial: I love Communal. It made moving in with a dog much easier
With Communal I have found a lot of new friends
I would have been late for an intervirew if it wasn't for the Help channel in Communal
It's nice to have a feeling for what is going on around you. Communal updates me on my neighborhood
Communal helped me get milk for my coffee.
My community started sharing gardening tools instead of everyone buying their own
I have realized that I have a lot of things in common with my neighbors
I borrowed some chairs for a party from a neighbor in the building across, we are now looking for an appartment together
My mom is always afraid when the news says something bad about Copenhagen. Now she uses my Communal user to verify that nothing is wrong in my area
I felt insecure moving to NÃ¸rrebro, but getting to know the people in the building made me feel safe
My kids loves that they can plan playtime with their neightbors on Communal
We have created a common herb garden, that we all help maintain, and use for community events
I love that my neighbors are so active in Communal. It makes me feel like I am part of a community
It's a great feeling when neighbors can use items, that I would otherwise have thrown away
Tom has the coolest room, but Mads from 2.B has the best toys!
I would have loved to have Communal in my old building. I would have gotten to know my neighbors better
